nodes.long_description:
GALARDONADO CON EL PREMIO JUEGO DE RV DEL AÑO POR IMGA

«Es mágico». VentureBeat

WANDS® te ofrece una experiencia de realidad virtual en primera persona con rápidos duelos de magia contra otros jugadores en línea. Elige tus varitas preferidas y equípalas con una variedad de hechizos únicos para enfrentarte a otros portadores en fantásticos reinos del Más Allá.

Mejora tus habilidades enfrentándote a un contrincante de IA cada vez más poderoso para, después, batir en duelo a jugadores de todo el mundo y, así, subir puestos en la clasificación. 

Compatible con juego cruzado, para que puedas enfrentarte a tus amigos, sin importar qué cascos de realidad virtual tengan.

Características:
Duelos de magia cargados de acción.
Magníficas arenas de combate.
25 hechizos únicos.
15 poderosas varitas.
Una comunidad llena de amistades.
Temporadas y eventos competitivos.
Selección estratégica de hechizos.
Contrincante de IA
nodes.short_description: WANDS® es una experiencia de realidad virtual en primera persona que ofrece duelos mágicos rápidos contra otros jugadores en línea. Equipe su varita mágica con una amplia variedad de hechizos y luche contra otros Wielders por fama, poder y gloria en los fantásticos reinos de El más allá. Explora nuevos hechizos y perfecciona tus habilidades en tu taller secreto entre batallas.

nodes.long_description:
AUSGEZEICHNET ALS VR-SPIEL DES JAHRES @ IMGA

„Die reinste Magie“ - VentureBeat

WANDS® ist ein First-Person-VR-Erlebnis mit rasanten Zauberduellen gegen andere Spieler online. Wähle deine favorisierten Zauberstäbe, rüste sie mit einzigartigen Zaubern aus und kämpfe in den fantastischen Welten des Jenseits gegen andere Träger.

Feile gegen einen zunehmend herausfordernden KI-Gegner an deinen Skills und duelliere dich dann mit Spielern auf der ganzen Welt, um die Ranglisten empor zu klettern. Entdecke zwischen den Kämpfen neue Zauber, schalte neue Charaktere frei und stelle in deiner geheimen Werkstatt mächtige Bewaffnungen zusammen.

Cross-Play wird unterstützt, damit du dich mit deinen Freunden duellieren kannst – egal, mit welchem VR-Headset sie spielen!
Das erwartet dich:
Actiongeladene Zauberduelle
Großartige Kampfarenen
25 einzigartige Zauber
15 mächtige Zauberstäbe
Einladende, freundliche Community
Wettkämpfe und Turniersaisons
Strategische Zauberauswahl
KI-Gegner
nodes.short_description: WANDS® ist eine First-Person-VR-Erfahrung, die rasante magische Duelle gegen andere Spieler online bietet. Rüste deinen Zauberstab mit einer Vielzahl von Zaubersprüchen aus und kämpfe in den fantastischen Reichen des Jenseits gegen andere Wielder um Ruhm, Macht und Ruhm. Entdecke neue Zaubersprüche und verbessere deine Fähigkeiten in deiner geheimen Werkstatt zwischen den Kämpfen.

nodes.long_description:
荣获 IMGA 年度最佳 VR 游戏奖

“感觉就像魔法”——VentureBeat

WANDS® 是一款第一人称VR游戏，提供快节奏的魔法决斗，与其他玩家在线对决。选择你最喜欢的魔杖，并为它们装备各种独特的咒语， 然后在奇幻领域“超凡”中与其他持魔杖的对手进行战斗。

对付越来越具有挑战性的AI对手，磨练你的技能，然后与来自世界各地的玩家决斗，登上排行榜。在战斗间隙，发现新的咒语、解锁新的角色，并在你的秘密作坊中制造强大的装备。

支持跨平台游戏，无论你的朋友拥有哪款VR头显，都可以进行决斗！

游戏特色：
动作丰富的魔法决斗
美丽的战斗竞技场
25种独特的咒语
15支强大的魔杖
友好的社区
充满竞争的赛季和活动
战略性的咒语选择
AI对手
nodes.short_description: 魔杖®是一款第一人称虚拟现实体验，提供快节奏的魔法决斗为你的魔杖汲取更多的法术，咒语，能量，为了名利，权力，和和至高荣耀。在接二连三的战斗之间，在你的秘密工作室中探索新法术和磨练你的技能。

nodes.long_description:
PRIX DU MEILLEUR JEU VR DE L’ANNÉE @ IMGA

« C’est magique » - VentureBeat

WANDS® est une expérience de VR en vue subjective qui vous propose de livrer des duels magiques dynamiques contre d’autres joueurs en ligne. Équipez vos baguettes préférées à doter de sorts uniques afin d’affronter d’autres magiciens dans les royaumes fantastiques de l’infini.

Perfectionnez vos compétences contre un adversaire IA stimulant avant de rivaliser contre des joueurs du monde entier pour tenter d’arriver en tête du classement. 

Les parties multiplateformes sont prises en charge, alors affrontez vos amis, quel que soit le casque VR avec lequel ils jouent !

Caractéristiques :
Des duels magiques pleins d’action
Des arènes de combat magnifiques
25 sorts uniques
15 baguettes puissantes
Une communauté amicale
Des saisons et des événements compétitifs
Une sélection stratégique de sorts
Un adversaire IA
nodes.short_description: WANDS® est un jeu de VR en première personne qui vous propose de livrer des duels magiques dynamiques contre d'autres joueurs en ligne. Dotez votre baguette d'une grande variété de sorts et affrontez d'autres Wielders pour la gloire, le pouvoir et la puissance dans les royaumes fantastiques de The Beyond. Explorez de nouveaux sorts et affinez vos compétences dans votre atelier secret entre deux batailles.

nodes.long_description:
AWARDED VR GAME OF THE YEAR @ IMGA

"It feels magical" - VentureBeat

WANDS® is a first-person VR experience that offers fast-paced magic duels against other players online. Choose your favourite wands and equip them with a variety of unique spells, then battle other Wielders in the fantastic realms of The Beyond.

Hone your skills against an increasingly challenging AI opponent, then duel players from around the world to climb the leaderboards. Between battles, discover new spells, unlock new characters, and build powerful loadouts in your secret workshop.

Cross-platform play is supported, so you can duel your friends no matter which VR headset they own!

Features:
 Action-Packed Magic Duels
 Beautiful Battle Arenas
 25 Unique Spells
 15 Powerful Wands
 Friendly Community
 Competitive Seasons and Events
 Strategic Spell Selection
 AI Opponent
nodes.short_description:
AWARDED VR GAME OF THE YEAR @ IMGA

"The quality of the experience is great, especially for a mobile VR game. It feels magical." - VentureBeat

Take on the role of a mysterious Wielder in an alternate 1890's London. Equip your wand with a wide variety of spells and battle other Wielders for fame, power and glory in the fantastic realms of The Beyond. Explore new spells and hone your skills in your secret workshop in between battles.

nodes.long_description:
Take on the role as a mysterious Wielder in an alternate 1880's London. Equip your wand with a wide variety of spells and battle other Wielders for fame, power and glory in the fantastic realms of The Beyond. Explore new spells and practice your skills in your secret workshop in between battles.

WANDS® is a first person fully mobile VR experience that offers fast paced magic duels against other players online. Progress and unlock new spells by winning battles and choose your own strategic playing style to defeat your opponents. Use the spectator feature to watch others battle in real time.

Action Packed Magic Duels
- Competitive Gameplay
- Spectacular Battle Arenas
- 16 Powerful Spells
- Strategic Wand Loadout
- Spectator Support

-Joe Durbin, UploadVR
“Wands For The Samsung Gear VR Looks Too Good To Be On Mobile"

 -vrgamesfor.com
“The game looks bloody gorgeous with magnificent environments, special effects and above all, great competitive VR gaming experience."
nodes.short_description: Take on the role as a mysterious Wielder in an alternate 1880's London. Equip your wand with a wide variety of spells and battle other Wielders for fame, power and glory in the fantastic realms of The Beyond. Explore new spells and practice your skills in your secret workshop in between battles.

nodes.change_log:
1.8.0 Patch Notes:

New Features
-Wand Powers: Wands have new and unique properties that make you more powerful
-New Wands: 5 brand new wands have been added to the game
-New Character: The Templar has entered The Beyond

Improved Features
-New AI difficulty: An “impossible” difficulty setting has been added
-The Crystal Wand is now unlockable
-New titles have been added for reaching skill ratings of 2600, 2700, 2800, and 2900
-Each loadout can have a different set of wands
-Current HP and Mana are now shown on your HUD
-Notification icon appears on blackboard when you have unclaimed rewards
-Event points can not be earned in friendly duels or against the AI
-Level text is displayed in Lobby
-All locked wands are shown at the Wand Station
-Seasonal match count is displayed in-game (will become visible next season)
-Teleport beacons at Relic Bench and Wand Station are shorter to make interaction easier
-Snap turning delay has been increased, making accidental double turns less likely
-AI matches cannot occur on Sanctum, preventing gas and sandstorm deaths

Game Balancing
-Dual Wielding pickup collection time reduced to 3s (down from 3.5s)
-6DoF mana regen rate increased to 13/s (up from 12/s)
-Flaming Phoenix – cooldown increased from 0.75s to 1.5s
-Chilling Clutch – cooldown increased from 0.5s to 1s
-Skull Specter – cooldown increased from 0.0s to 1.5s
-Skull Specter – height raised to prevent firing into the ground
-Armor of the Sun – cast cost increased from 50 to 75
-Curse of the Undead – cast cost increased from 40 to 50

Bug Fixes
-Summons’ projectiles no longer pass through the Warden’s arm on Aspis Prison
-DPS damage does not immediately disappear from HUD
-Electric Fist no longer causes significant framerate issues
-Tile-based spells cannot be cast through the trains’ flat cars on Ortus Station
-Haptic feedback on one hand is not interrupted by haptic feedback on the other hand
-Opponent’s voice is no longer audible when they’re muted
-Casting Chaos Leap while teleporting no longer prevents further teleporting
-AI does not glitch on bottom tile of Aspis Prison
-Devil’s Spit can no longer be fired from your previous location
-Titles for Season 17 and up have been added
-English text for Season 16 titles has been fixed
-Teleport no longer fails when it’s the first spell selected when using the Point control scheme
